title: League keeps Crashing in-game,need help
body:
since last week everytime i get into a game my device crashes as if it had been turned off at around 3 minutes of starting a game,i have tried different solutions
(updating the drivers and windows - playing on widowed mode - turning game DVR off - cooling and cleaning the device -running the game as an admin - updating and reinstalling the game - doing a clean startup - using ccleaner -playing with a windows 7 compatibility) 
but non have worked
(i tried the LOL bugsplat and crash tips but nothing have worked so far )

the device is a laptop with:
windows 10 pro , 
intel celeron n3060 1.6GHz dual CPU 
,with 8 GB RAM and a
 5.0 shaders capable graphics card

i have been playing league for over 6 months and never had any problems like this before,and i have not been able to play since last week.
please help

replies.body: Crashes are a sign that something either with the computer or client hasn't been updated properly! I have some steps in our [Crash Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974) you should go over. After going through each one, if the problem persists, make sure to let me know and I will dig a bitter deeper to find out what's going on.

I just went through them and tried them all but unfortunately nothing worked.
I have updated the drivers and the game ,and reinstalled everything
but it still crashes the PC down

same here and its always at the 3 min mark when the jungle starts to spawn. ive uninstalled and installed and still the same thing. ive switched my internet networks 3 times from my dads to my gfs and mine and it still happens. so i cant be my network or my computer either. please fix this. its horrible when u go back into lane lvl and the enemy is already almost lvl 3
